From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 7:22 AM
To: Ivy Duduaco <Ivy.Duduaco@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Sandro Sawaya <Sandro.Sawaya@chalhoub.com>; Fathima Bellikunhi <Fathima.Bellikunhi@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; Zahra Sulaiman <Zahra.Sulaiman@chalhoub.com>; Maylin Galvez <Maylin.Galvez@3d-consultants.com>; Agnes Joseph <Agnes.Joseph@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: Management Offices HO1 Insurance claim

 

Dear Ivy,

 

The 3D invoice is an internal billing document and is not considered by the insurer.

 

Furthermore, there is a 10% deductible for water leakage, as per the terms and conditions of the insurance policy.

 

Finally, VAT is recoverable by the company. As such, the insurer does not provide additional compensation for it.

 

Therefore, the net compensation from the insurance is as follows:

 

Total repairs conducted:               AED 76,002.00

Less Excess (10%)                            AED 7,600.20

Net:                                                        AED 68,401.80

 

Once the transfer is made for the claim, we will request the amount to be allocated to CG Business Management.

 

Trust the above clarifies the situation.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

alvez@3d-consultants.com <mailto:Maylin.Galvez@3d-consultants.com> >; Agnes Joseph <Agnes.Joseph@chalhoub.com <mailto:Agnes.Joseph@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Management Offices HO1 Insurance claim

 

Dear Ivy,

 

The 3D invoice is an internal billing document and is not considered by the insurer.

 

Furthermore, there is a 10% deductible for water leakage, as per the terms and conditions of the insurance policy.

 

Finally, VAT is recoverable by the company. As such, the insurer does not provide additional compensation for it.

 

Therefore, the net compensation from the insurance is as follows:

 

Total repairs conducted:               AED 76,002.00

Less Excess (10%)                            AED 7,600.20

Net:                                                        AED 68,401.80

 

Once the transfer is made for the claim, we will request the amount to be allocated to CG Business Management.

 

Trust the above clarifies the situation.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
